price: 81. Dheh: Xaqu waa yimid, baadilkuna waa baabbi'i; baadilku waa wax baabba’a.
arabic: وَقُلۡ جَآءَ ٱلۡحَقُّ وَزَهَقَ ٱلۡبَٰطِلُۚ إِنَّ ٱلۡبَٰطِلَ كَانَ زَهُوقٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waqul jāa al-ḥaqu wazahaqa al-bāṭilu inna al-bāṭila kāna zahūqan
